thread.title: Stephen Curry hit 8 threes in the first half and dropped a defender with a filthy crossover
thread.title_full: Stephen Curry hit 8 threes in the first half and dropped a defender with a filthy crossover

author: Tim Cato
title: Stephen Curry hit 8 threes in the first half and dropped a defender with a filthy crossover
text:
Curry is cooking.
Stephen Curry’s magic is back. If you need proof, please see Wednesday’s game. Let’s start with this jumper ...
... and follow it up with this vicious crossover that DROPPED Marvin Williams .
Curry had eight three-pointers and 26 points at halftime. It’s safe to say that his dad Dell Curry’s three before the game inspired him. 
Like father, like son. pic.twitter.com/59Q2jPOIVf 
— Warriors Talk (@JaeAzizi) February 2, 2017 Curry, I do believe, is good at basketball.
